About me

Let me introduce myself

Hi, I'm Maxim Snoeys, student Application Development in Geel. Most of my interest of this study field are in the web-development side of things.
This portfolio will guide you through what I achieved during my 3 years of studying.

With my knowledge of electronics from highschool I like to make some stuff for my DIY racing simulator and drone. Oh, before I forget to tell you, I like to cook delicious things!

I got a life changing experience by spening the first semester of the 3rd year as an exchange student in Jyväskylä, Finland!

Internship

Plan of approach Reflection Realisations

Summary of my internship at iO Herentals

Usually during an IT-internship you work on 1 project (internal, proof of concept, ...) where you plan and work on during your 13 weeks at the company.
In my case it is a little different... I applied for a role as front-end web-developer at Intracto (becoming iO). I landed in a team where the websites they build are small to medium-sized, so the rotation between them is pretty quick.

In the beginning I got a lot of small tickets to get familiar with the way of working with different tools/programs. After that short introduction period I got 2 projects where I could work on.

Most of my time I spend making the bigger portion of the front-end for the new Möbius website. This is build in Hubspot (a CMS like WordPress), the styling is a combination of Bootstrap and SCSS.
The second one is an AR project for EnergyVille. Scanning a marker displaying a 3D-model (made by another department at iO) where you can toggle certain objects inside the model.
